name: Conscientious Knight Commander Nizno's Helmet
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The Action Probability Estimator drops in Sector 13 and can be used for various tradeskill processes. #L "Action Probability Estimator" "257960" #L "Conscientious Knight's Helmet" "225541" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Action Probability Estimator + Conscientious Knight's Helmet = #L "Conscientious Knight Commander Nizno's Helmet" "257115"
